textBox.richText: As you may have noticed, I just changed the theme of my blog. I was growing tired of the dark, dismal “darkroom” layout that I had before. This layout makes my rather seemingly meaningless posts seem more …professional. However, changing the theme wasn’t as easy as I had hoped. I selected the new theme from the happy drop-down menu, whereupon the theme of the main page had then changed to fit my selected choice. It wasn’t until I decided to check on my actual entries when I saw the horror of my carefully planned out layout of the text boxes and other miscellaneous things had all been REARRANGED. I had fun moving things around in EVER ENTRY I’VE EVER MADE. Now I know I’ll be in for an even more exciting time if I ever want to change the theme again! …I’ve used the word “theme” way too many times in that paragraph. On a different note, I also believe I am getting over The Topic that which made up most of the percentage of my last posts. I might possibly be considering someone else now. She was a fellow Southampton student, but I guess I never thought about it then due to: 1) I was concerned with …other things, and 2) she was taken. But, as it turns out, she was one of the many couples that ended in a horrible, flaming plane crash over the summer. Yes, crazy, I know; especially after my past huge rants about all of this. You may feel it appropriate to call me a “whiny hypocrite” or something of the sort, but OH WELL I don’t care. I’m going to have to see how this plays out, though. It seems somewhat promising; who knows. And as of today, I have been suffering from MAJOR ALLERGIES. I have been blowing my nose and/or sneezing ALL DAY. I best not be getting sick; I can’t afford that now, not with school just starting! …Ah, yup; there I go sneezing again. Fffffffuuuuuuuuu--
